name: SAM Commander Arena
description:
Take control of a SAM launcher and secure the skies over Europe! Set in the near future where an environmental disaster brought about armed conflict and civil unrest to every continent, you are the commander of the Wolfdogs, a mercenary Surface-to-Air defense unit hired by overwhelmed governments trying to bring the situation under control. In multiple scenarios, you will be defending cities from constant aerial attacks, fending off waves of enemy fighters and cruise missiles as well as strategically locating and shooting down enemy bombers hiding in the chaos of general air traffic.

The game is an accessible but realistic simulation of a SAM launcher featuring an intuitive and simple control interface. It includes detailed radar operations, targeting and air traffic. Before you are put to the test with real missions, a comprehensive playable tutorial will guide you through all important aspects of being in control of a SAM system, giving even inexperienced players the skills needed to find and shoot down enemy airplanes.
